title: Sales and marketing research support services
snippet:
I need a number of freelancers to carry out Internet research for sales development. You will need to carry out research on companies,  individuals and contact points within the organisations. You will use a variety of web sites to carry out your research and will be able to quickly and accurately enter data into spreadsheets.

Please note that providers of automated tools, scrapers and solutions that violate terms of use on sites must not apply for this role. The position is only for freelancers that will comply with the terms of use of the sites being visited and use proven research methods.

Please respond with a brief description of similar work you have done and the tools and processes you have used and have experience with.
